title: California reopening June 15: COVID-19 capacity limits, distancing requirements to end
content:
1. California reopening June 15: COVID-19 capacity limits, distancing requirements to end  KABC-TV
  2. California to Drop Social Distancing Requirements in June  NBC Bay Area
  3. California unveils sweeping plan for full reopening on June 15 as COVID fades  Yahoo News
  4. COVID-19 health 'requirements of the past are no longer needed' come mid-June, Ghaly says  KCRA News
  5. California won’t create a vaccine passport, but large events will be screened  The Mercury News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
